original: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,

original: dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,

original: te 'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /

original: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ  #

original: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /

original: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
